　　Alexia Barlier is born in Paris. But was brought up in both French and English languages - her mother coming from New-Zealand - and she has double nationality. She is known for playing Magda, Daniel Auteuil's mistress, in Dialogue avec mon Jardinier (2007) and the same year, Pierre Arditi's young fiancé, Judith, on the stage of the Théâtre Montparnasse in Paris. She was also remarked in the Canal+ action show Kali (2010) where she played the lead part. And lately, Alexia has been Sergeant Eva Blum in the successful French cop show Falco (2012-2014).
